gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 99, Magic 96
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Magic, 99-96. Duncan Robinson led the way with 23 points, four rebounds, and three assists for the Heat, with Bam Adebayo adding 21 points, 11 rebounds, and seven assists in the victory. Paolo Banchero tallied 25 points, eight rebounds, and six assists for the Magic in the defeat. The Heat improve to 22-16 in the regular season, while the Magic fall to 21-17.
